QuestData.Title: Rocky Upheaval
QuestData.Description: To the east, on the Crimson Expanse, you will find Gorsik. He embodies the more unstable and violent nature of our kind. He is neither friendly, nor trusting, but his word carries weight.$B$BProving yourself to Gorsik will go a long way towards proving yourself to the Stonemother.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Gorsik the Tumultuous upon the Crimson Expanse.
QuestData.RewardText: You are Diamant's chosen.$B$BSo small. So fragile.$B$BDo you realize that your actions shall be the basis by which your entire, "Earthen Ring" is judged? You truly think you can stand for so many?$B$BYou are a fool. A confident fool. We shall see if you are a capable fool as well.
